title: Textile, ca. 1825
dimensions: H x W (each swatch, approximate): 8 x 5.5 cm (3 1/8 x 2 3/16 in.)
description: 46 Swatches of printed fabric (23 per side of page - one missing on each side) each numbered in pen and ink from 506 through 529. Each swatch measures about 5.5 x 8 cm. (2 1/8" x 3 1/8"). All patterns are small scale floral in at least 3 colors. Yellow over blue for green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1825.Medium: paper, cotton
Technique: printed. Gift of Mrs. Lincoln Johnson. 1975-85-7.
